nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets address associated with the given identifier.
@param identifier Identifier of contract whose address we want to look up.
nodes.name: getAddressFor

params.identifier: Identifier of contract whose address we want to look up.
Identifier of contract whose address we want to look up.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

params.identifier: Identifier of contract whose address we want to set.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

getAddressFor(string).notice: Gets address associated with the given identifier.

getAddressForOrDie(string).notice: Gets address associated with the given identifier.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAddressFor(string,address).notice: Associates the given address with the given identifier.
